TopicTitle: Launch a ship with no crew?

Articles.Content:
so in 0.19 if I wanted to launch a ship with a crewable pod but no crew (for a rescue mission or somesuch), I would start with the OKTO2 pod and put a mk1-2 pod on top of it.

It seems 0.2 is extremely eager to fill any manned pod on my ship. Any ideas?

Well, you could use a Hitchhiker Storage Container, which doesn't count as a command pod so it won't fill with Kerbals.

OR

You could do the same thing you did in 0.19 and just EVA the Kerbals and leave them on the launchpad so when you launch another ship they will be cleared.

Happy Flying!

You also could add a probe to your rocket if you haven't already and use this mod. It allows you to remove Kerbals from rockets on the ground and transfer them around to different manned parts in space.
